books.author: by Walter Lord
books.description: This reissue of Lord’s classic 1955 you-are-there account of the Titanic’s sinking includes an introduction by Nathaniel Philbrick.
books.name: A NIGHT TO REMEMBER

books.author: by Rachel Maddow
books.description: America’s path to war has become too easy, with excessive power ceded to the executive branch, the MSNBC host argues.
books.name: DRIFT

books.author: by Clint Hill
books.description: Recollections of the Secret Service agent assigned to guard Jacqueline Kennedy.
books.name: MRS. KENNEDY AND ME

books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus and the angels during an appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Hank Haney
books.description: The golf coach’s memoir describes his six eventful years with Tiger Woods.
books.name: THE BIG MISS

books.author: by Charles Duhigg
books.description: A Times reporter’s account of the science behind how we form, and break, habits.
books.name: THE POWER OF HABIT

books.author: by Jonah Lehrer
books.description: An account of the science of creativity argues that it is not a gift but a group of thought processes that can be learned.
books.name: IMAGINE

books.author: by A. J. Jacobs
books.description: The author of “The Know-It-All” and “The Year of Living Biblically” samples workouts, diets and gadgets in pursuit of optimal health in every organ.
books.name: DROP DEAD HEALTHY

books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: A biography of the recently deceased entrepreneur, based on 40 interviews with Jobs conducted over two years.
books.name: STEVE JOBS

books.author: by Elizabeth Kaye
books.description: Stories of the passengers in the Titanic’s lifeboat No. 8, one of the first to leave the sinking ship.
books.name: LIFEBOAT NO. 8

books.author: by Carole King
books.description: A memoir by the songwriter, singer and activist.
books.name: A NATURAL WOMAN

books.author: by Cheryl Strayed
books.description: A woman’s account of a life-changing 1,100-mile hike along the Pacific Crest Trail.
books.name: WILD

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Blaine Harden
books.description: A journalist’s account of the life of Shin Dong-hyuk, who escaped the North Korean prison camp where he was born and raised.
books.name: ESCAPE FROM CAMP 14

books.author: by Chris Kyle with Scott McEwen and Jim DeFelice
books.description: A member of the Navy SEALs discusses his battlefield experiences.
books.name: AMERICAN SNIPER
